thread.title: 14 Of Kodak Black's One-Line Answers From Incredibly Awkward "Breakfast Club" Interview
thread.title_full: 14 Of Kodak Black's One-Line Answers From Incredibly Awkward "Breakfast Club" Interview

author: Victoria Hernandez
title: 14 Of Kodak Black's One-Line Answers From Incredibly Awkward "Breakfast Club" Interview

organizations.name: kodak black's one-line answers from incredibly awkward "breakfast club
going to celebrate black history month

text:
New York, NY – Kodak Black came through Power 105.1’s The Breakfast Club to talk about a slew of topics, from threatening to dethrone Lil Wayne, to his first purchase after getting out of jail in December. 
But here’s the kicker: he did the entire interview wearing a ski mask. 
Hosts Charlamagne, Angela Yee and DJ Envy could tell it was young Kodak because of his gold grill and hairstyle lumps that showed through the mask, but that didn’t help the awkwardness of the interview as the Florida rapper gave mostly brief answers. 
Here are 14 of those pretty straightforward responses, which give a glimpse inside the mind of the 19-year-old artist. 
On Challenging Lil Wayne To A Fight For Title Of “Best Rapper Alive” 
“I don’t even wanna talk about it. He too old,” Kodak Black says amid several moments of silence. 
On Being Done With All the “Bull-Crap” 
“I can’t win from losing, so gotta stay level-headed.” 
On Having A Mentor In The Game 
“I mean, if Master P ever holler at me, I’d holler at him.” 
On How He’s Going To Celebrate Black History Month 
“I’m finna drop my Cutlass.” 
On What He Bought First After Getting Out Of Jail 
“I had about a hundred condoms. I had to see what that hot and cold thing do, but I don’t like it. It be burning after that.” 
“Even if he said it first, you’re probably like 50 years old.” 
On Wale Writing To Him In Jail 
“At least he took his time to write a nigga.” 
On His Dad Reaching Out 
“A part of me was like, one day he’s gonna die, and I’m gonna be like … then I’ll be like dang … Another part of me, yeah…” 
On His Mom Getting A Boyfriend One Day 
“As long as she cook for me.” 
On His Girl’s Reaction To Kodak Accidentally Exposing Himself On Instagram Live 
“She wasn’t mad about that. She thought I dropped it on purpose ’cause she know me.” 
“Nigga you know who I am. Nicki Minaj knows who I am.” 
On How He’s Keeping His Career Moving 
“I’ve been innovating.” 
On Whether He’s A Clone In That Ski Mask 
“I’m Tupac resurrected.” 
On Why He’s Going To Put Kirk Franklin On His Album
